commands.name: Generate Website Pages from Markdown
commands.run: npx cursor generate-pages content/website-copy.md --framework nextjs --output app/(marketing)

commands.name: Build Page Routes
commands.run: echo 'Creating page routes...' && mkdir -p app/(marketing) && echo 'export default function Page() { return <Home /> }' > app/(marketing)/page.tsx

commands.name: Deploy Website
commands.run: git add . && git commit -m 'Automated site update via Cursor' && git push origin main && vercel --prod --yes

notes: Each ## heading in website-copy.md becomes a marketing component.
Use 'Generate Website Pages from Markdown' to scaffold Next.js routes.
Use 'Generate Components from Markdown Sections' to create reusable components.
Run 'Deploy Website' to auto-commit changes and trigger a live Vercel deployment.
